form.question: Does Company have a Data Protection policy?

child_questions.question: Please attach a copy of your Data Protection policy.

form.question: Does your company provide training to staff on data protection?

child_questions.question: How often does this training take place?

form.question: Will Company be processing (or have access to) any personal data, including but not limited to: Names, Phone Numbers, Postal Addresses, Email Addresses, IP Addresses, Customer ID, or any other personal data or PII?

child_questions.question: Please detail all types of personal or PII data you'll be processing.

form.question: Please detail under what circumstances (if any) you will be transferring personal data to or from the EEA in connection with the services?
form.prompt: Please note that personal data includes any IP addresses, customer ID’s etc. you may have access to.

form.question: Will any additional third parties have access to any personal data originating from or belonging to FT?

child_questions.question: Please list all additional third parties and their Country of operation, including the services to be outsourced.

form.question: Has Company ever been prosecuted or investigated for data protection related offences?
